channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP

item.title: CVE-2018-2470|2024-08-05T04:21:34.206Z -- sap -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20for%20abap
item.description: In SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP, from 7.0 to 7.02, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and from 7.50 to 7.53, applications do not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
